title: Centrus Ramps up US Uranium Production
description: Centrus Energy jumps after launching US uranium enrichment manufacturing. CEO Amir Vexler, a former GE executive, joined Bloomberg to talk about how nuclear power can meet AI-driven energy demand, why US policy is shifting fast, and what domestic fuel means for markets, jobs, and national security. (Source: Bloomberg)
